Class TownGraphManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • TownGraphManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TownGraphManagerInterface

    public class TownGraphManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements TownGraphManagerInterface
    TownGraphManager class adds, checks, retrieves, removes, and reads from file of Towns (Vertices) and Roads (Edges).
    Author:
    Alex Juan

      • addRoad

        public boolean addRoad(java.lang.String town1,
                       java.lang.String town2,
                       int weight,
                       java.lang.String roadName)
        Adds a road with 2 towns and a road name
        Specified by:
        addRoad in interface TownGraphManagerInterface
        Parameters:
        town1 - name of town 1 (lastname, firstname)
        town2 - name of town 2 (lastname, firstname)
        weight - the weight of the road
        roadName - name of road
        Returns:
        true if the road was added successfully

      • getRoad

        public java.lang.String getRoad(java.lang.String town1,
                                java.lang.String town2)
        Returns the name of the road that both towns are connected through
        Specified by:
        getRoad in interface TownGraphManagerInterface
        Parameters:
        town1 - name of town 1 (lastname, firstname)
        town2 - name of town 2 (lastname, firstname)
        Returns:
        name of road if town 1 and town2 are in the same road, returns null if not

        getPath in interface TownGraphManagerInterface
        Parameters:

        town2 - name of town 2 (lastname, firstname)
        Returns:
